info.title: Safety Data Sheet Assessment
info.description: This service writes assessment data for safety data sheets that is provided by an external application into safety data sheet assessments in the Product Compliance solution in SAP S/4HANA Cloud. The service creates new assessments or releases existing assessments. In addition, the service also reads data of safety data sheet assessments and provides this data to an external application.

x-sap-shortText: Read, create, and release of safety data sheet assessments using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Chemical Compliance Approval for Purchased Material and Supplier(31G)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/31G " Link To BP ")
[Assess Marketability of a Product(31H)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/31H " Link To BP ")
[Assess Dangerous Goods for a Product(3FC)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3FC " Link To BP ")
[Manage Safety Data Sheets for Products(3VR)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3VR " Link To BP ")
[Request Regulatory Documentation from Service Provider(6AV)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6AV " Link To BP ")

GET SafetyDataSheetAssessment HTTP/1.1
